meta.label: AB testing split
meta.description: Split a list of users into a A group and a B group.

inputRoles.name: user_list
inputRoles.label: Dataset with the reference of the users involved in the experiment
inputRoles.description: Dataframe containing the ids, the emails of the users in the experiment

outputRoles.name: groups
outputRoles.label: Experiment dataset
outputRoles.description: Input dataset with an extra column containing the group

outputRoles.name: tracking
outputRoles.label: Tracking dataset
outputRoles.description: Keeps the input parameters of the experiment

outputRoles.name: A_group
outputRoles.label: A group (optional)
outputRoles.description: Dataset containing the users who are part of the group A

outputRoles.name: B_group
outputRoles.label: B group (optional)
outputRoles.description: Dataset containing the users who are part of the group B

params.name: user_reference
params.label: User reference
params.description: Column containing user reference (user Id , email...). Each user should have a unique reference.

selectChoices.label: Retrieve sizes computed in the Web app

params.name: n_A
params.label: Sample size for variation A
params.description: Minimul sample size for the A group

params.name: n_B
params.label: Sample size for variation B
params.description: Minimul sample size for the B group
